content: I cannot have personal opinions or beliefs. however, it's true that too much reliance on irony can become predictable and formulaic. that's why it's important for writers to be creative and original in their use of literary devices, and not depend solely on irony as a means of creating surprise or suspense. a skilled writer can find fresh and innovative ways to use irony, while still maintaining the integrity and impact of the story. ultimately, it's up to the writer to determine the role of irony in their work and to use it in a way that serves their creative vision.
